subject: DERM
title: Dermatology Preceptorship
info: This elective is useful to the student planning a career in a primary care specialty or dermatology.

subject: DERM
title: Advanced Dermatology
info: Students will gain further experience in all aspects of dermatology.  This course is appropriate for medical students interested in pursuing a career in Dermatology.

subject: DERM
title: Research in Dermatology
info: An introduction to research in dermatology. The student pursues a research project through clinical or laboratory research. The specific project is individually formulated by the student and faculty. As time permits during this course, the student is invited to attend research and teaching conferences conducted by the Department of Dermatology.
